item.title: CVE-2021-36827|2024-09-16T19:36:46.206Z -- saturday%20drive -- ninja%20forms%20contact%20form%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Auth. (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Saturday Drive's Ninja Forms Contact Form plugin <= 3.6.9 at WordPress via "label".
